reference.shortdesc: The text element associates no semantics with its content. It exists to serve as a container for text where a container is needed (for example, as a target for content references, or for use within restricted content models in specializations).

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Unlike ph, text cannot contain images. Unlike keyword, text does not imply keyword-like semantics. The text element contains only text data, or nested text elements.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: This an example of Text that is reusable, with no extra semantics attached to the text when it is reused.
